```r
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), housing_data$total_bedrooms)
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), sqrt(housing_data$total_bedrooms))# Highest correlation
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), exp(housing_data$total_bedrooms))
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), log(housing_data$total_bedrooms)) # Second highest correlation
cor(log(housing_data$median_house_value), housing_data$total_bedrooms^2)
```
